discursive_diversity module

discursive_diversity.get_DD(chat_data)
discursive_diversity.get_cosine_similarity(vecs)

computes cosine similarity between a list of vectors input: list of vectors (vecs) (this has to be a pair!) output: cosine similarity

discursive_diversity.get_unique_pairwise_combos(lst)

Computes all unique pairwise combinations of the elements in a list. input: array or list output: list of unique pairwise combinations of elements of the input list
